author: Eziilee Howell
comment: The app will not download onto my Motorola 360 2nd gen. I have tried several Husky apps they will not download

author: Cristi Silaghi
comment: Ok
This is a very impressive face.  Besides an original and beautiful face, the customization features are better than those of any of the other 20 or 30 faces I have collected.
Generally a good watch face.  A few minor bugs that have not been addressed in the latest updates, but still worth using on my watch.

author: Panther
comment: Another fantastic watch face the only downside is that it doesn't have all the options that the real weather watch face has keep up the great work 👌👍

author: Arun James
comment: ഉഗ്രന്‍

author: Mike Crossley
comment: Great job once again by HUSKYDev and I now have more praise for everyone. I had a problem only due to a phone change and they were fantastic and solved it immediately. This is a fantastic app!!!  It does everything I need while looking fantastic, with the less than $3 Premium cost. Thanks again guys, love it now I've spent the time picking up the experience. Great option would be to be able to edit a saved options setting, but that's small.

author: Doron Reinis
comment: After the update you can't change the lounch bar content. i tried doing it from the phone however it doesn't transfer to the watch. I am a oaying customer

author: Gale Gale
comment: Don't work on Samsung Frontier. Wasted my money

author: Aicani Holten
comment: Actually sucks. Can't really change much without buying it. I do not recommend this.

author: alex steiner
comment: Love it works perfect on my LG Urban

author: Mariela Barboza
comment: Love it

author: Dave M
comment: This app provides all the info I need right on the main screen. No problems with my moto 360.
title: Great for a free app

author: Michael Timmins
comment: Great!

author: Trevor Raridon
comment: Can you guys add some zoom settings for the map? Would be great if the map could show me something besides that I'm on planet earth, it's so far zoomed out. Other than that great watch face with lots of features, keep up the good work!
title: Cool background map but...

author: Wai Siew
comment: ... But always go back to this one. Has useful information on the face at a glance and easy access to other features too.
title: Always like to try new faces

author: Keith Walker
comment: For me.  This is the best watch face around.  It has everything you need.
title: Excellent

comment: Very nice

author: Josh Gurtner
comment: This watch face has more than enough. Premium version is a must. The shortcuts are a nice feature as well.
title: Nice Look for Motorola 360

author: William Somar
comment: but the demo version is locked down tight,  making it hard to evaluate. I would like to play with the display parameters before committing to premium version. Unfortunately, very little display options on demo version. This latest update only included premium updates.
title: Looks like a nice watch

author: Simon Hayward
comment: Like the weather face, Love the look and feel of the face and how configurable it is, would like to see the map location option to be zoomed in as so small you can't see that much.... The frustration lies with the integration to Google Fit which sometimes works, sometimes reverts back to previous counts, such a shame
title: Nice Watch face

author: Aureliano Cilocilo
comment: Premium paid but doesn't work something wrong or not compatible..hello admin..Stop sending this apps anymore better refund my payments thank you...

author: Joe Bernard
comment: Map doesn't change. Has me as Europe even though I'm in the US and have location enabled.  Addendum: prompt response and fix. Thank you!

reply.author: HuskyDev
reply.content:
Hi Joe,
- in the Atlas phone application and click on the Refresh button in Map options, see the screenshot http://prntscr.com/c4prk2
- Click to the SEND button - http://prntscr.com/afwqgt
- Send e-mail to huskydevcz@gmail.com  and paste the Log TAG to identify your log file

Full description of how to send log is here - https://justpaste.it/vy02

author: Brian Donley
comment: Great watch face, looks beautiful, very customizable. Would get 5 stars if you could zoom background map to local area rather than just map of the whole US with a marker on your location
title: Great looking, needs map zoom

author: teamgumby
comment: It's an okay but not great.  My map shows the entire US and not a close view.

author: William Shannon
comment: Very Cool

author: gregory wallace
comment: This is the best wstch face I have seen so far. Love it very well put together. Love the features I even delete some apps from my watch because they are included in this app. Great job

author: Andrew Hall
comment: Love this, keeps getting better with each update! Love the ease of access for apps etc, and how customisable it is.

author: Jason Chandler
comment: One of the best watch faces there are.

author: Andrew Maves
comment: Great start,  and I love everything.  But the background map only shows Europe and won't update to my location in Arizona.  Once that's corrected,  5 stars!

reply.author: HuskyDev
reply.content:
After installation the map shows europe, but when you first time downloading the wheather data, then your current location is used for downloading the correct map for your location.

If is not working and you are the premium user, try to update you location for weather data manully http://prntscr.com/b7b9qf
Or send me a LOG http://prnt.sc/afwqgt

title: Map location won't update

author: William Steele
comment: Very cool, almost don't need wear mini launcher anymore. I would like to see a way to swap out the google fit indicator for something else but other than that it seems pretty cool. A bit dark though.

author: James Thompson
comment: I purchased the premium  version and the background atlas has me located in Europe while I am in Santa Fe, New Mexico, USA. I tried setting manually and it still keeps me in Europe. Would like my money back until you fix the app.

reply.author: HuskyDev
reply.content:
Hi James,

Your problem is with location.
1. check what is your position in watchface weather detail http://prntscr.com/be5naw.
2. Try to change weather provider in config activity.
3. Check whether you have internet connection for downloading the map image.
4. If stil not work, send me an email to the huskydevcz@gmail.com

title: Map sucks

comment: Please  support..refund the money

reply.author: HuskyDev
reply.content:
Hi,
our watch faces not working with Tizen OS.
You can send the order number to the huskydevcz@gmail.com and I will refund your money.
